DOC.brief_summary: Needle-free jet injector provide alternative patient diabetes treated insulin . This study aim evaluate pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics ( PK-PD ) profile lispro administer jet injector conventional pen .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic Profile Insulin Lispro Using Needle-Free Jet Injection Technology
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , double-dummy , crossover study . Eighteen healthy volunteer recruit . Lispro ( 0.2 units/kg ) administer jet injector conventional pen seven-hour euglycemic clamp test perform . PK-PD profile lispro calculate .
